title: Stage Lv7-P4-S23
description: Level 7 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Having completed the analysis, we proceeded to write the final report.
Being concerned about the deadline, the team worked overtime to finish the project.
learning_points: Level 7 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 분석을 완료한 후, 우리는 최종 보고서를 작성하기 시작했다.
sentences.en: Having completed the analysis, we proceeded to write the final report.

sentences.kr: 마감일을 걱정하여, 팀은 프로젝트를 완료하기 위해 야근했다.
sentences.en: Being concerned about the deadline, the team worked overtime to finish the project.

sentences.kr: 아무런 응답을 받지 못했기 때문에, 우리는 직접 연락하기로 결정했다.
sentences.en: Not having received any response, we decided to contact them directly.

sentences.kr: 자금이 부족하여, 회사는 일부 프로젝트를 연기해야 했다.
sentences.en: Being short of funds, the company had to postpone some projects.

sentences.kr: 시장 조사를 수행한 후, 우리는 새로운 전략을 개발했다.
sentences.en: Having conducted market research, we developed a new strategy.

sentences.kr: 경험이 부족했기 때문에, 그는 전문가의 조언을 구했다.
sentences.en: Lacking experience, he sought advice from experts.

sentences.kr: 모든 요구사항을 충족한 후, 시스템이 승인되었다.
sentences.en: Having met all requirements, the system was approved.

sentences.kr: 충분한 데이터를 수집하지 못했기 때문에, 연구가 불완전했다.
sentences.en: Not having gathered sufficient data, the research remained incomplete.
